CYCLONE SSE CHANGES
===================

0.7.5
-----
* ability to publish into multiple channels for HTTP publish handler

0.7.4
-----
* server statistics export to graphite

0.7.3
-----
* fix installation problems on CentOS 5
* using dicts for channels and clients state

0.6.5
-----

* possibility to launch cyclone-sse twisted plugin with custom application (which can have custom handlers or brokers)

0.6.1
-----

* first pypi release
